servicesLabel.title: Services
servicesLabel.subtitle: Design services to help your business

services.title: Design consultation
services.description: In-depth audit with custom strategies to enhance UX, boost conversions, and drive growth.

services.title: UX/UI design
services.description: A full web or app experience of your choice that engages, converts, and work seamlessly on any device.

services.title: Branding
services.description: Helping you create a strong, consistent, and memorable brand identity that reflects your company’s values and vision.

testemonials.description: When I was opening up my own law firm I used Louise’s services. She was very service minded, diligent, professional and easy to have contact with. I would highly recommend Louise as a designer both in regards to her skills and customer friendliness.
testemonials.name: Martin Szydlowski

testemonials.description: She completely changed the way I think about design. I used to see it as just ‘making things look nice,’ but now I understand how much it affects how people perceive and trust my business.
testemonials.name: Christiaan Bester

testemonials.description: When I was opening up my own law firm I used Louise’s services. She was very service minded, diligent, professional and easy to have contact with. I would highly recommend Louise as a designer both in regards to her skills and customer friendliness.
testemonials.name: Martin Szydlowski
